messages.subject: Front Porch HS Book Sale In York, PA
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, Please pass along the message that I am offering HS materials from Elementary through High School for $0.50 to $2.00 each.  I have hundreds of texts and
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

Please pass along the message that I am offering HS materials from
Elementary through High School for $0.50 to $2.00 each. I have
hundreds of texts and workbooks available that must go.

These are new to gently used texts and workbooks. Many are not used
or marked up at all.

They will be available from Friday evening (4:00) until they are
gone!!!!!

Many items are free, everything must go!!!!!!

Theresa Towers twina_b@... or twina_b@...
425 Atlantic Avenue
York, PA
